data.lyric:
[ti:Hope]
[ar:XXXTentacion]
[al:Hope]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Hope - XXXTentacion
[00:02.97]Yeah
[00:10.89]Rest in peace to all the kids that lost their lives in the Parkland shooting
[00:13.98]This song is dedicated to you
[00:25.97]Okay she keep callin' she keep callin' every single night
[00:29.71]Day and night on my mind please don't kill the vibe
[00:32.99]All alone swear to God I be in my mind
[00:36.29]Swear I wanna die yeah when you cross my
[00:38.76]Said I wanna die yuh no I'm not alright yuh
[00:42.05]I might start a riot yuh I'm so f**kin' tired yuh
[00:45.35]So what's up what you say
[00:46.98]Feelin' good I'm feelin' great
[00:48.67]Tired of the f**kin' hate stackin' cheese all on my plate
[00:54.13]So outside my misery I think I'll find
[01:00.72]A way of envisioning a better life
[01:06.71]For the rest of us the rest of us
[01:11.96]There's hope for the rest of us the rest of us
data.trans:
[ti:Hope]
[ar:XXXTentacion]
[al:Hope]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.97]//
[00:10.89]安息吧 所有在帕克兰德枪击案中丧生的孩子们
[00:13.98]这首歌献给你们
[00:25.97]每个夜晚 她都在哭泣 她都在呼唤
[00:29.71]日日夜夜那声音在我脑海里萦绕 请不要影响我的心情
[00:32.99]孤独的我 对上帝发誓 永远不会忘怀
[00:36.29]一想起你 我真的不愿独自苟活
[00:38.76]我说过我不愿活着 是的 我的状况是不好
[00:42.05]或许我会开始一场暴乱 我真的好累
[00:45.35]所以怎么了 你说什么
[00:46.98]感觉不错？我感觉也不错
[00:48.67]我已经厌倦没日没夜的拼命赚钱
[00:54.13]这痛苦我已承受不来 我想我会找到
[01:00.72]一条更为幸福更为美好的生活之路
[01:06.71]为还活着的我们 为还活着的我们
[01:11.96]活着的我们终还会有希望的
